member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.IClient.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time-out value in milliseconds for the and methods.
member.returns: The number of milliseconds to wait before the request times out. The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds).
member.exception: The value specified is less than zero and is not .

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Attribution.AttributionValue
member.summary: Defines the value of attribution for the given touchpoint Attribution: ATT = CRT / CRA

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Attribution.ConversionRateAllContacts
member.summary: Number of metaclients that were classified in the timeframe compared to all metaclients available - Comes from GoalStatistics Conversion rate all: CRA = GoalClassified / (GoalClients / 100)

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Attribution.ConversionRateTouchpoint
member.summary: Number of metaclients that were classified after they hit the touchpoint, compared to all metaclients that were hitting the touchpoint in the timeframe Conversion rate touchpoint: CRT: = GC / (TPR / 100)

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Attribution.GoalCompletions
member.summary: Metaclients that were classified for the referenced goal in the given timeframe, after they hit the touchpoint. Abbr. GC

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Attribution.TouchpointHits
member.summary: Number of hits for the touchpoint in the given timeframe Abbr. TPR

member.name: T:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction
member.summary: Represents an interaction 'Subject-Predicate-Object' for data intelligence purposes.
member.remarks: An interaction represents a certain timestamped action of a subject (client from an interaction source) that potentially uses/affects an object. An interaction can also be used to represent a state of a subject.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new interaction instance

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.Subject
member.summary: The subject of the interaction, a.k.a. the client identifier of the source.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.Predicate
member.summary: The predicate (verb) of the interaction.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.Object
member.summary: The object of the interaction.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.Timestamp
member.summary: The date and time when the activity occurred.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.IPAddress
member.summary: The IP address from which the interaction is sent.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.Interaction.SubjectMetadata
member.summary: A dictionary representing the metadata associated with the subject. It could contain any number of key-value pairs where the key is an identifier for the metadata record and the value is the actuall metadata.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.Subscribe(System.Action{Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient,Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.LeadScoringThresholdPassesInfo})
member.summary: Subscribes to the client in order to receive notifications when there are Lead Scoring Threshold passes.
member.param: The callback method which will be used to process Lead Scoring Threshold passes.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.Unsubscribe
member.summary: Unsubscribe from the current instance and stops further checks for Lead Scoring Threshold passes. It will wait for 30 seconds for pending checks to complete before unsubscribing.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.ForceUnsubscribe
member.summary: Unsubscribe from the current instance and stops further checks for Lead Scoring Threshold passes. If a check is currently executing, it will be stopped immediately.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.Unsubscribe(System.Int32)
member.summary: Unsubscribe from the current instance and stops further checks for Lead Scoring Threshold passes. It will wait for the specified timeout seconds for pending checks to complete before unsubscribing.
member.param: The amount of time to wait for pending checks to complete before unsubscribing.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.GetLeadScoringThresholdPasses(Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.LoadOptions)
member.summary: Retrieves all Lead Scoring Threshold Passes according to the passed Load Options.
member.param: LoadOptions object specifying how to load the Lead Scoring Threshold passes.
member.returns: Lead Scoring Threshold Passes according to the passed Load Options.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.GetLeadScoringThresholdPasses(Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.LoadOptions,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves Lead Scoring Threshold Passes that have occurred from the specified date onwards and according to the passed Load Options.
member.param: LoadOptions object specifying how to load the Lead Scoring Threshold passes.
Specifies the date from which onward the Lead Scoring Threshold passes should have occurred.
member.returns: Lead Scoring Threshold Passes that have occurred from the specified date onwards.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.PageSize
member.summary: The page size to be used when reading Lead Scoring Threshold passes.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.FromDate
member.summary: The date from which onwards the client would check for Lead Scoring Threshold passes.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.IsSubscribedTo
member.summary: Indicates whether there is a subscriber to the current client instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.TimerIntervalInSeconds

member.name: P:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ILeadScoringEventClient.ThresholdPassCallbackErrorOccurred
member.summary: A callback that would be invoked when an exception occurs in the Scoring Threshold Passed Callback specified via the Subscribe method.

member.returns: A previously saved timestamp. If such is not available the DefaultTimestamp

member.name: T:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient
member.summary: Represents an object exposing the functionality provided by the mappings restful service. It is used to import mappings between one and the same subjects coming from different sources.

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient.ImportSubjectMappings(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.SubjectMapping})
member.summary: The method imports а collection of SubjectMapping objects to the Telerik.DataIntelligence server. The method sends the objects in batches with the most efficient chunk size. There are no limitations to the number of objects to be passed to the method. The operation is asynchronous.
member.example:
Sample usage:
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings); //the mappings are imported in background, the method returns immediately.
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings).Wait(); //the execution is blocked until all of the mappings are imported.
int imported = client.ImportSubjectMappings(mappings).Result; //the execution is blocked until all of the mappings are imported. Returns the number of imported mappings.
member.exception: The exception is thrown when one or more of the background tasks have failed. Check the InnerExceptions property for more details
member.param: a collection of SubjectMapping objects to be transmitted to the server

member.name: M:Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.ISubjectMappingClient.ImportSubjectMapping(Telerik.DigitalExperienceCloud.Client.SubjectMapping)
member.summary: The method imports а single SubjectMapping object to the Telerik.DataIntelligence server. The operation is asynchronous.
member.example:
Sample usage:
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mapping); //the mapping is imported in background, the method returns immediately.
client.ImportSubjectMappings(mapping).Wait(); //the execution is blocked until all of the mapping is imported.
member.exception: The exception is thrown when there is server side or communication problem. Check the InnerExceptions property for more details
member.param: a SubjectMapping object to be transmitted to the server
